org.metaborg.spoofax.shell.client

Interface IInputHistory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JLine2InputHistory, JLine2PersistentInputHistory

    public interface IInputHistory
    This interface represents the input history of a REPL session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default List<String> allEntries()
      Same as entries(0).
      void append(String newEntry)
      Append a new entry to the end of the input history.
      default List<String> entries(int from)
      Same as entries(from, #size()).
      List<String> entries(int from, int to)
      Return the entries in the specified range.
      default String get(int index)
      Get a single history entry.
      default String getMostRecent()
      Get the most recent input history entry.
      default void loadFromDisk()
      Optionally supported operation.
      default void persistToDisk()
      Optionally supported operation.
      int size() 

    • Method Detail

      • append

        void append(String newEntry)
        Append a new entry to the end of the input history.
        Parameters:
        newEntry - The new entry to append.

      • getMostRecent

        default String getMostRecent()
        Get the most recent input history entry. Default implementation is equal to get({@link #size()} - 1).
        Returns:
        The most recent history entry.

      • get

        default String get(int index)
        Get a single history entry. Default implementation is equal to entries(index, index + 1).get(0).
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the history entry.
        Returns:
        The history entry at the given index.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        The amount of history entries currently stored.

      • allEntries

        default List<String> allEntries()
        Same as entries(0).
        Returns:
        All entries, oldest first.

      • entries

        default List<String> entries(int from)
        Same as entries(from, #size()).
        Parameters:
        from - The index from which to return the history, inclusive.
        Returns:
        The history entries from the specified index, oldest first.

      • entries

        List<String> entries(int from,
                     int to)
        Return the entries in the specified range.
        Parameters:
        from - The index from which to return the history, inclusive.
        to - The index to which to return the history, exclusive.
        Returns:
        The entries in the specified range, oldest first.

      • loadFromDisk

        default void loadFromDisk()
                   throws IOException
        Optionally supported operation. When implemented, the input history should be read from a file.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an IO error occurs while reading the input history from the file system.

      • persistToDisk

        default void persistToDisk()
                    throws IOException
        Optionally supported operation. When implemented, the input history should be written to a file.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an IO error occurs while writing the input history to disk.
